project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password with customizable length, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Implement functionality to configure password length
Implement logic to generate random uppercase letters
Implement logic to generate random lowercase letters
Implement logic to generate random numbers
Implement logic to generate random special characters
Implement the final logic to combine all character types and generate the password
Write tests to verify password generation functionality
Execute tests to ensure the password generation works as expected
